REQ-VIC-001.title: Conquest Victory

blockers.reason: Requires sector tracking and counting to determine controlled_sectors / total_sectors ratio

REQ-VIC-001.notes: Standalone victory condition: Control 60% of 500 sectors. Only hard dependency is sector system for counting.

REQ-VIC-002.title: Economic Victory

blockers.reason: Requires resource types (Credits, Food, Ore, Petroleum) for networth calculation
Networth includes sector values and production rates
Networth includes military_power × 10; can skip military contribution initially
Networth includes sector values (× 500); can approximate with sector count

REQ-VIC-002.notes: Dynamic victory condition requiring networth ratio to second place. Formula: (your_networth / second_place_networth) >= 1.5

REQ-VIC-003.title: Diplomatic Victory

blockers.reason: Requires coalition member tracking and sector summing (50% of total = 250 sectors)
Requires coalition formation system (minimum 3 members, all alliances, +50 rep with all members)

REQ-VIC-003.notes: Coalition-based victory: Sum sectors of all coalition members >= 50% (250 sectors). All members win together.

REQ-VIC-004.title: Research Victory

blockers.reason: Requires tech tree tracking: Doctrine + Specialization + Capstone (1 available per game) + 10 advanced techs

REQ-VIC-004.notes: Tech tree completion victory. Formula: (capstone_complete AND advanced_tech_count >= 10)

REQ-VIC-005.title: Military Victory

blockers.reason: Requires military unit definitions with power values (soldiers=1, fighters=4, cruisers=20, dreadnoughts=200)
Requires military unit tracking and power calculation for all empires

REQ-VIC-005.notes: Military supremacy victory: your_military >= (sum_all_others × 2). Extremely difficult threshold.

REQ-VIC-006.title: Survival Victory

blockers.reason: Score formula includes networth component; can implement with simplified scoring
Score includes resource value contributions
Score includes military_power × 10
Score includes sectors × 500
Score includes tech_tier_average × 1000
Score includes reputation × 100

REQ-VIC-006.notes: Fallback victory when turn limit reached (200 turns standard). Highest composite score wins. All blockers are SOFT—can use simplified score.

REQ-VIC-007.title: Victory Point Calculation (Parent Spec)
REQ-VIC-007.notes: Parent spec split into 7 atomic sub-specs (REQ-VIC-007-A through G). Each calculates VP for one victory category.

REQ-VIC-007-A.title: Conquest VP Formula

blockers.reason: Conquest VP calculation depends on Conquest Victory's sector tracking
Requires total_sectors count (500 at game start)

REQ-VIC-007-A.notes: Formula: conquest_vp = (controlled_sectors / total_sectors) × (10 / 0.6). Linear scaling 0-10 VP.

REQ-VIC-007-B.title: Economic VP Formula

blockers.reason: Economic VP depends on Economic Victory's networth calculation and second-place tracking

REQ-VIC-007-B.notes: Formula: economic_vp = (your_networth / second_networth) × (10 / 1.5). Updates when empires are eliminated.

REQ-VIC-007-C.title: Diplomatic VP Formula

blockers.reason: Diplomatic VP depends on Diplomatic Victory's coalition tracking
Requires active coalition membership and sector summing

REQ-VIC-007-C.notes: Formula: diplomatic_vp = (coalition_territory / total_sectors) × (10 / 0.5). Only applies if in coalition.

REQ-VIC-007-D.title: Research VP Formula

blockers.reason: Research VP depends on capstone and advanced tech completion tracking
Requires tech completion state and tier tracking

REQ-VIC-007-D.notes: Formula: research_vp = ((capstone_progress × 0.5) + (advanced_techs / 10 × 0.5)) × 10. 50/50 weighting on capstone vs breadth.

REQ-VIC-007-E.title: Military VP Formula

blockers.reason: Military VP depends on Military Victory's power calculation
Requires military unit power values
Requires summing military power across all empires

REQ-VIC-007-E.notes: Formula: military_vp = (your_military / sum_all_others) × (10 / 2.0). Hardest VP to achieve due to 2.0x threshold.

REQ-VIC-007-F.title: Survival VP Formula

blockers.reason: Survival VP depends on score calculation (only applies at turn limit)

REQ-VIC-007-F.notes: Formula: survival_vp = (your_score / highest_score) × 10. Only relevant if turn limit reached without other victory.

REQ-VIC-007-G.title: Total VP Aggregation

blockers.reason: Total VP = MAX of all categories; requires conquest_vp
Total VP = MAX of all categories; requires economic_vp
Total VP = MAX of all categories; requires diplomatic_vp
Total VP = MAX of all categories; requires research_vp
Total VP = MAX of all categories; requires military_vp
Total VP = MAX of all categories; requires survival_vp

REQ-VIC-007-G.notes: Aggregation: total_vp = MAX(all 6 category VPs). Triggers notifications at 5, 7, 9, 10 VP thresholds. Players see leading victory path.

REQ-VIC-008.title: Anti-Snowball Mechanics (Parent Spec)
REQ-VIC-008.notes: Parent spec split into 7 atomic sub-specs (REQ-VIC-008-A through G). Each implements one anti-snowball mechanic triggered at 7 VP.

REQ-VIC-008-A.title: Anti-Snowball Trigger Threshold

blockers.reason: Trigger checks if total_vp >= 7 and manages activation/deactivation state

REQ-VIC-008-A.notes: Triggers when any empire reaches 7 VP (70% progress to victory). All anti-snowball effects activate/deactivate together.

REQ-VIC-008-B.title: Combat Attack Bonus vs Leader

blockers.reason: Only applies when anti-snowball is active (leader at 7+ VP)
Requires combat system to apply +10% attack bonus modifier

REQ-VIC-008-B.notes: Non-leaders gain +10% attack bonus when attacking leader. Applies to all combat (space, ground, orbital).

REQ-VIC-008-C.title: Combat Defense Bonus vs Leader

blockers.reason: Only applies when anti-snowball is active (leader at 7+ VP)
Requires combat system to apply +5% defense bonus modifier

REQ-VIC-008-C.notes: Non-leaders gain +5% defense bonus when defending against leader attacks. Smaller than attack bonus (+10%) to encourage offense.

REQ-VIC-008-D.title: Market Price Penalty for Leader

blockers.reason: Only applies when anti-snowball is active (leader at 7+ VP)
Requires market system to apply +20% cost multiplier to leader's buy orders

REQ-VIC-008-D.notes: Leader pays +20% more for market purchases (× 1.2 multiplier). Sell prices unaffected. Applies to all resources.

REQ-VIC-008-E.title: Reputation Decay for Leader

blockers.reason: Only applies when anti-snowball is active (leader at 7+ VP)
Requires reputation system to apply -2 reputation decay per turn

REQ-VIC-008-E.notes: Leader loses 2 reputation points per turn automatically (minimum 0). Decay stops at 0, doesn't go negative.

REQ-VIC-008-F.title: Automatic Coalition Offers

blockers.reason: Coalition offers only when leader reaches 7 VP for the first time
Requires coalition formation system and NAP/Alliance tracking to identify eligible recipients

REQ-VIC-008-F.notes: Automatic coalition offers sent once per 7 VP threshold crossing to all empires with existing NAP/Alliance with any empire. Not sent every turn.

REQ-VIC-008-G.title: Anti-Snowball Mechanics Coordination

blockers.reason: Central trigger coordinator; all other mechanics depend on this
Combat bonuses must activate/deactivate with coordinator
Combat bonuses must activate/deactivate with coordinator
Market penalty must activate/deactivate with coordinator
Reputation decay must activate/deactivate with coordinator
Coalition offers must be triggered by coordinator

REQ-VIC-008-G.notes: Master coordinator ensuring all anti-snowball mechanics activate/deactivate simultaneously at 7 VP threshold. No partial activation states allowed.

REQ-VIC-009.title: Victory Notifications

blockers.reason: Notifications triggered by VP milestone crossings (5, 7, 9, 10 VP)

REQ-VIC-009.notes: Players notified at VP milestones: 5 VP (Yellow), 7 VP (Orange + anti-snowball alert), 9 VP (Red), 10 VP (Gold). Audio cues included.

REQ-VIC-010.title: Victory Achievement Screen

blockers.reason: Screen displays victory type and final statistics
Screen displays victory type and final statistics
Screen displays victory type and final statistics
Screen displays victory type and final statistics
Screen displays victory type and final statistics
Screen displays victory type and final statistics

REQ-VIC-010.notes: Game-ending UI: displays winner, victory type, final statistics, and leaderboard. Screen freezes on victory moment.

topDependedOnSpecs: REQ-VIC-007-G (Total VP Aggregation) - depended on by 5 specs (REQ-VIC-008-A, REQ-VIC-009, and others)
REQ-VIC-008-A (Anti-Snowball Trigger) - depended on by 6 specs (REQ-VIC-008-B through G)
REQ-VIC-001 (Conquest Victory) - depended on by 2 specs (REQ-VIC-007-A, REQ-VIC-010)
REQ-VIC-002 (Economic Victory) - depended on by 2 specs (REQ-VIC-007-B, REQ-VIC-010)
REQ-VIC-003 (Diplomatic Victory) - depended on by 2 specs (REQ-VIC-007-C, REQ-VIC-010)
REQ-VIC-004 (Research Victory) - depended on by 2 specs (REQ-VIC-007-D, REQ-VIC-010)
REQ-VIC-005 (Military Victory) - depended on by 2 specs (REQ-VIC-007-E, REQ-VIC-010)

reasons: Coalition territory summing for Diplomatic VP
Resource values for Economic Victory networth
Military power calculation for Military Victory
Tech completion tracking for Research Victory
Tech tier averaging for Survival score
Market price penalty for leader during anti-snowball

criticalPath.rationale: Six core victory conditions must be defined before VP calculations can work
VP calculation formulas depend on wave 0; REQ-VIC-007-G (Total VP Aggregation) unlocks notifications and anti-snowball
Player-facing notifications and victory screen depend on VP calculations (wave 1)
Anti-snowball mechanics depend on VP system (wave 1) and other game systems (combat, market, diplomacy)

blockingDependencies.REQ-SEC-001: Blocks: REQ-VIC-001 (sector counting), REQ-VIC-007-A (Conquest VP), REQ-VIC-003 (coalition territory)
blockingDependencies.REQ-RES-001: Blocks: REQ-VIC-002 (networth formula requires resource types), REQ-VIC-006 (score formula)
blockingDependencies.REQ-RES-002: Blocks: REQ-VIC-002 (networth includes sector values), REQ-VIC-006 (score formula)
blockingDependencies.REQ-MIL-001: Blocks: REQ-VIC-005 (military power calculation), REQ-VIC-007-E (Military VP formula)
blockingDependencies.REQ-MIL-002: Blocks: REQ-VIC-005 (military tracking), REQ-VIC-007-E (Military VP requires all empires' power)
blockingDependencies.REQ-RSCH-001: Blocks: REQ-VIC-004 (tech tree completion), REQ-VIC-007-D (Research VP formula)
blockingDependencies.REQ-DIP-001: Blocks: REQ-VIC-003 (coalition formation), REQ-VIC-008-E (reputation decay), REQ-VIC-008-F (coalition offers)

notesOnSplitSpecs.REQ-VIC-007: Split into REQ-VIC-007-A through G for atomic VP formulas. Each formula can be tested independently. REQ-VIC-007-G (Total VP Aggregation) is critical—unlocks notifications and determines which victory path is 'leading'.
notesOnSplitSpecs.REQ-VIC-008: Split into REQ-VIC-008-A through G for atomic anti-snowball mechanics. REQ-VIC-008-A (Trigger Threshold) must activate first; others depend on it. REQ-VIC-008-G (Coordination) ensures all mechanics activate/deactivate together without partial states.

implementationNotes: Wave 0 (6 specs) is completely independent of other game systems except sector, resource, military, research, and diplomacy systems—must be implemented in parallel.
Wave 1 (7 specs: VP calculations) depends entirely on Wave 0. REQ-VIC-007-G is the lynchpin—must aggregate all 6 category VPs correctly.
Wave 2 (2 specs: UI/notifications) is lightweight and depends only on VP system (Wave 1).
Wave 3 (7 specs: anti-snowball) is most complex—depends on VP system (Wave 1) AND external game systems (combat, market, diplomacy). Can be parallelized by mechanic.
Victory achievement is determined by checking if total_vp >= 10 in any category (after REQ-VIC-007-G aggregation).
Anti-snowball represents ~40% of VICTORY system complexity due to cross-system coordination (combat, market, diplomacy, reputation).
Hard blockers: 32/42 dependencies are HARD, indicating Victory system is tightly coupled to Resource, Military, Research, Sector, Diplomacy, Combat, and Market systems.
Soft blockers: 10/42 dependencies are SOFT, mostly in Economic Victory (can simplify networth initially) and Survival Victory (can use basic score).
